directions: Place first 3 ingredients in bowl. Mix in enough mayonnaise to form thick spread.
Preheat broiler. Top bread rounds with spread. Arrange bruschetta on baking sheet. Broil until spread is heated through and begins to brown, about 2 minutes.
ingredients: 1 6-ounce jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained, patted dry, chopped
title: Artichoke Bruschetta
